languages.text: "Обязанность Главного кормчего — следовать курсу во что бы то ни стало. Ты сбился с курса, Равор — твои руки должны быть заняты штурвалом, а не наставлять оружие на сво{mf|его|ю} Лорд-капитана".
"It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Обязанность Главного кормчего — следовать курсу во что бы то ни стало. Ты сбился с курса, Равор — твои руки должны быть заняты штурвалом, а не наставлять оружие на сво{mf|его|ю} Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted course. You have veered off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."
"It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted course. You have veered off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."
"It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

"It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Es ist die Pflicht des Hauptsteuermanns, niemals vom Kurs abzuweichen. Ihr seid jedoch weit vom Kurs abgekommen, Ravor. Ihr solltet am Steuerrad stehen, anstatt Euren Lord Captain mit einer Waffe zu bedrohen."
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist die Pflicht des Hauptsteuermanns, niemals vom Kurs abzuweichen. Ihr seid jedoch weit vom Kurs abgekommen, Ravor. Ihr solltet am Steuerrad stehen, anstatt Euren Lord Captain mit einer Waffe zu bedrohen."

languages.text: « C'est le devoir du maître timonier que de ne jamais dévier de l'itinéraire établi. Vous vous êtes par trop écarté du droit chemin, Ravor. C'est le gouvernail que vous devriez avoir entre les mains, pas une arme braquée sur votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le devoir du maître timonier que de ne jamais dévier de l'itinéraire établi. Vous vous êtes par trop écarté du droit chemin, Ravor. C'est le gouvernail que vous devriez avoir entre les mains, pas une arme braquée sur votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «El deber del maestro timonel es no desviarse de la ruta trazada. Se ha desviado mucho, Ravor. Sus manos deberían estar al timón, no apuntando con un arma a su Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «El deber del maestro timonel es no desviarse de la ruta trazada. Se ha desviado mucho, Ravor. Sus manos deberían estar al timón, no apuntando con un arma a su Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「星間図に示された航路から決して外れないことは、マスター・ヘルムスマンの任務だ。航路から大きく外れているぞ、ラヴォア。お前の手は舵を握るためのものであって、ロード・キャプテンに武器を向けるためのものではない」
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「星間図に示された航路から決して外れないことは、マスター・ヘルムスマンの任務だ。航路から大きく外れているぞ、ラヴォア。お前の手は舵を握るためのものであって、ロード・キャプテンに武器を向けるためのものではない」

languages.text: “舵手长的职责是确保飞船永远不会偏离航线，而你已经偏离航线太远了，雷沃。你的手应该握紧舵盘，而不是拿着武器，指着你的领主舰长。”
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “舵手长的职责是确保飞船永远不会偏离航线，而你已经偏离航线太远了，雷沃。你的手应该握紧舵盘，而不是拿着武器，指着你的领主舰长。”

languages.text: "Çizilmiş rotadan asla sapmamak, Başserdümen'in görevidir. Sen bu rotadan çok uzaklaştın Ravor. Ellerin Lord Kaptan'a silah doğrultmak yerine dümen tutmalı."
languages.original_text: "It is the Master Helmsman's duty never to deviate from the charted route. You have veered far off course, Ravor. Your hands should be holding the wheel, not pointing a weapon at your Lord Captain."
